languages.text: {n}Ваш взгляд пронзает пиратку насквозь, и вы чувствуете — груз ее грехов настолько тяжек, что вскоре утащит ее за собой на самое дно. Страх позволил зловредным когтям чужой воли вцепиться в ее душу, и они медленно раздирают ее на части.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваш взгляд пронзает пиратку насквозь, и вы чувствуете — груз ее грехов настолько тяжек, что вскоре утащит ее за собой на самое дно. В ее душе медленно расползается черное пятно скверны, но трудно понять, результат это ее порочных деяний или за ним скрывается что-то более зловещее.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш взгляд пронзает пиратку насквозь, и вы чувствуете — груз ее грехов настолько тяжек, что вскоре утащит ее за собой на самое дно. Страх позволил зловредным когтям чужой воли вцепиться в ее душу, и они медленно раздирают ее на части.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your eyes pierce the pirate, and you sense that the burden of her sins is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

{n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

{n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的目光立刻穿过了莱萨。你感觉到，她犯下了极其沉重的错误，这个错误很快就会把她压垮。出于恐惧，她允许邪恶的意志将魔爪伸入她的灵魂，将其慢慢撕成碎片。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的目光穿过了莱萨。你感觉到，她犯下了极其沉重的错误，这个错误很快就会把她压垮。出于恐惧，她允许邪恶的意志将魔爪伸入她的灵魂，将其慢慢撕成碎片。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの目は瞬時に海賊を見通す。彼女はいずれ罪の重さに引きずり込まれるのだろうと感じる。彼女の恐怖心が悪を呼び寄せ、魂に爪を立て、ゆっくりと粉々に引き裂いていくことになるのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの目は瞬時に海賊を見通す。彼女はいずれ罪の重さに引きずり込まれるのだろうと感じる。彼女の恐怖心が悪を呼び寄せ、魂に爪を立て、ゆっくりと粉々に引き裂いていくことになるのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus ojos ven a través de la pirata al instante: sientes que la carga de sus transgresiones es tan pesada que pronto la arrastrará. Su miedo ha permitido que una voluntad maligna hunda sus garras en su alma y la despedace lentamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus ojos atraviesan a la pirata y sientes que la carga de sus transgresiones es tan pesada que pronto la arrastrará. Su miedo ha permitido que una voluntad maligna hunda sus garras en su alma y la despedace lentamente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du durchschaust die Piratin augenblicklich und spürst, dass die Last ihrer Sünden so schwer ist, dass sie sie bald hinabziehen wird. Ihre Angst hat einem bösen Willen gestattet, seine Klauen in ihre Seele zu hauen und sie langsam in Stücke zu reißen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Augen durchbohren die Piratin, und du spürst, dass die Last ihrer Sünden so schwer ist, dass sie sie bald hinabziehen wird. Ihre Angst hat einem bösen Willen gestattet, seine Klauen in ihre Seele zu hauen und sie langsam in Stücke zu reißen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre regard transperce la pirate et vous sentez que le fardeau de ses crimes est si lourd qu'il est sur le point de la faire tomber. Sa peur a laissé s'insinuer en elle une volonté malfaisante qui a plongé ses griffes dans son âme et la déchiquète peu à peu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre regard la transperce et vous sentez que le fardeau de ses crimes est si lourd qu'il est sur le point de la faire tomber. Sa peur a laissé s'insinuer en elle une volonté malfaisante qui a plongé ses griffes dans son âme et la déchiquète peu à peu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Korsanın bir bakla sakladığını derhâl görüyorsun. Belli ki suçlarının omuzlarına bindirdiği yük ona ağır geliyor. Bu ağırlık, çok geçmeden onu batırıp boğacak. Korkusu yüzünden adi bir irade; ruhuna pençelerini geçirmiş, onu paramparça ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes see through the pirate instantly, and you sense that the burden of her transgressions is so heavy that it will soon drag her under. Her fear has allowed a malicious will to sink its claws into her soul and tear it slowly to pieces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Korsanın bir bakla sakladığını derhâl görüyorsun. Belli ki suçlarının omuzlarına bindirdiği yük ona ağır geliyor. Bu ağırlık, çok geçmeden onu batırıp boğacak. Korkusu yüzünden adi bir irade ruhuna pençelerini geçirmiş, onu paramparça ediyor.{/n}
